title: Hi, I’m Pin-Yi Chen
text:
My Photo



I am a business-minded data wrangler who bridges marketing, real estate, and analytics. I specialize in transforming complex information into clear, engaging, and actionable insights.

title: Hi, I’m Pin-Yi Chen
text:
About Me
Hi! I am Pin-Yi Chen, an  MBA student at Cal Poly Pomona , set to graduate in May 2025. Before graduate school, I worked in real estate marketing, sales, and business operations, which helped me develop a sharp understanding of customer needs, data-driven decision-making, and digital marketing.
Currently, I am focused on developing advanced skills in data wrangling, business analytics, and marketing intelligence using R, Tidyverse, and Quarto. My strength lies in blending technical knowledge with communication and market sense. I thrive on solving problems and simplifying complexity, whether it’s a dataset or a business challenge.

title: Hi, I’m Pin-Yi Chen
text:
Let’s Connect
You can email me or connect on LinkedIn.

Welcome to my portfolio.

title: Strategic Marketing
text: Below are selected projects that showcase my work in strategic marketing, campaign development, and brand management. These examples highlight how I apply leadership, data-informed decision making, and creative direction to drive marketing success.

title: Strategic Marketing
section: Real Estate Marketing Campaign: Lease-Up Strategy for Rega Group
text:
Real Estate Marketing Campaign: Lease-Up Strategy for Rega Group
In this project, I led a digital content-driven campaign for a portfolio of residential properties in Southern California. Using photography, video, and social media insights, I developed an end-to-end strategy to improve leasing performance and tenant engagement.
Skills Demonstrated:

Marketing Strategy: Designed messaging and content tailored to renter demographics.
Data-Driven Targeting: Conducted competitor and area analysis to refine positioning.
Creative Production: Captured on-site media to highlight key amenities and lifestyle appeal.
Performance Optimization: Tracked engagement metrics to refine paid and organic tactics.

title: Strategic Marketing
section: B2B Sales Enablement Campaign: Regional GTM Support at Bolide Technology
text:
B2B Sales Enablement Campaign: Regional GTM Support at Bolide Technology
This initiative supported the rollout of B2B video surveillance systems across key territories in California. I partnered with account teams to deliver value-based presentations, refine sales decks, and improve regional partner engagement.
Skills Demonstrated:

Sales Strategy Support: Analyzed client needs and industry trends to inform messaging.
Stakeholder Enablement: Delivered demo sessions and training materials for channel partners.
Account-Based Marketing (ABM): Tailored outreach for high-value business clients.
Presentation Design: Created sales decks that aligned product value with client pain points.

title: Marketing Analytics
text:
Below are selected projects and contributions that demonstrate my experience applying marketing analytics in both real estate and B2B environments. These examples reflect my ability to bridge creative execution with data strategy to drive business outcomes.
Whether it’s leading digital campaigns, optimizing regional sales, or turning property data into leasing insights, I consistently use marketing data to inform decision-making and improve performance.

title: Marketing Analytics
text:
What You’ll Find

Digital Campaign Strategy: Designing and executing content-driven marketing plans that grow engagement and visibility.
Market & Property Analysis: Applying research and data tools to guide pricing, leasing, and investment decisions.
B2B Sales Enablement: Using data insights to support partner relationships, product presentations, and growth strategies.
Process Optimization: Improving vendor coordination, budget workflows, and team communication through analytics and automation.

title: Résumé
text:
You can view a PDF version of my résumé here.

Professional Summary
I’m a data-driven marketing analyst with experience developing interactive reports using R, Quarto, and modern data visualization tools to support business and marketing decisions. My recent projects focus on data wrangling, campaign performance analysis, and market insights, transforming raw datasets into actionable strategies. With a strong foundation in statistical analysis and storytelling, I specialize in building tools and dashboards that make complex marketing data clear, interactive, and decision-ready.


CERTIFICATIONS
Licensed Real Estate Salesperson (California)


Technical Skills & Tools

Data Wrangling: R, Tidyverse, Quart
Data Visualization: Tableau, ggplot2
Business Writing & Presentations: Tableau
Real Estate & B2B Sales Strategy: Property Management Software
Social Media Marketing: Google Analytics 4
Budget Planning & Market Research: Excel, Google Sheets
